title: Patagonia CEO: Banks need to stop financing the climate crisis. Here’s how other companies can help make that happen - Fortune
content: Patagonia CEO: Banks need to stop financing the climate crisis. Here’s how other companies can help make that happen  Fortune
description: When your company deposits money in a bank, the bank can lend it to finance fossil fuels. Patagonia CEO Ryan Gellert says it's time to draw the line.
